title: Metaspins.com
author: Metaspins.com
created_time: October 06, 2022, 01:15:23 PMLast edit: December 19, 2022, 11:15:23 AM by Metaspins.com

comments.author: Apocollapse
comments.body: Welcome to the forum, the casino has a good UI/UX but where's the scroll bar? I didn't find that and it's hard for me to scroll down without that.I see you're have a promotion mostly about for high rollers since it's about account level and share of big wagering amount. Have you consider to have a promotion about welcome bonus, free spins or such highest multiplier for Bitcointalk user only?Also you can conduct signature campaign in order to maximize your advertisement.

comments.author: Little Mouse
comments.body: Welcome here. just had a quick look and I'm impressed with the design. Maybe we are going to have another great casino. haven't created an account yet but I will check it out tonight and join. Can you please confirm whether you require KYC or not? I just read you are 100% crypto casino.Edit- Just found the terms and conditions- https://metaspins.com/info/terms-and-conditions

comments.author: Nrcewker
comments.body: Welcome to the forum mate.Really impressed by the professional announcement thread. It’s very rare to see a new site following all the professional aspects to make their site and announcement thread looks professional.I am in love with the site’s UI and colour scheme. It’s really soothing the eyes.Is the site available to all the players from all around the globe? Is there any winning limitation? Do we have to complete KYC in order to gamble here?Eagerly waiting for positive responses.

comments.author: efialtis
comments.body: Nice to see you on Bitcointalk, welcome! Talking about professionalism: We have been in talks with their team for months now, which is great - it goes to show some dedication and planning.Check out our review guys: https://www.btcgosu.com/review/metaspins-casino/

But there are still some things the team needs to work on to make the site look even better. Among them are scroll bars and links such as ToS, About, and Contact.Or will we see it when registered and in the dashboard? If so, it won't look good because a user will want to know the rules and other links before they sign up.

comments.body: welcome to the forum, nice to see you here, will try to play

comments.body: Quote from: Nrcewker on October 06, 2022, 01:41:03 PMWelcome to the forum mate.Really impressed by the professional announcement thread. It’s really soothing the eyes.Is the site available to all the players from all around the globe? Is there any winning limitation? Do we have to complete KYC in order to gamble here?Eagerly waiting for positive responses.One thing I love the forum for is that they know how to criticise any one or company that does not do the correct thing. Everyone will be on their neck until the right thing is done. In the other hand, if a casino does the right thing they will be praised and encouraged. Welcome to the forum, you have a nice UX design and a good announcement thread. I'll advice that you have an active staff here to answer members questions and begin to build your reputation over the time.

comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.created_time: October 06, 2022, 06:36:40 PMLast edit: December 16, 2023, 06:47:59 PM by Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: First, I want to say.. Welcome to the forum, its nice having you guys here.I checked the casino out and I must say you have a very nice UX design and a user friendly interface, signing up is also very good and speedy, took me less than a minute to sign up, and I notice you guys do not require users to verify the email address they are signing up with - wouldn't this cause problems in tht future?And I wish to comment on this part I screenshot and uploaded below, do you guys offer the ability to switch or swap between crypto  coins inside the casino? If yes, then I think this is unique (as I've not come across any casino with such a feature) and will make your casino stand out.

comments.author: stomachgrowls
comments.body: Quote from: Fivestar4everMVP on October 06, 2022, 06:36:40 PMFirst, I want to say.. Welcome to the forum, its nice having you guys here.I checked the casino out and I must say you have a very nice UX design and a user friendly interface, signing up is also very good and speedy, took me less than a minute to sign up, and I notice you guys do not require users to verify the email address they are signing up with - wouldn't this cause problems in tht future?And I wish to comment on this part I screenshot and uploaded below, do you guys offer the ability to switch or swap between crypto  coins inside the casino? If yes, then I think this is unique (as I've not come across any casino with such a feature) and will make your casino stand out.Well, for you it do looks nice but not for most people.Even though simplicity is beauty but this one is just too simple or being that generic.There's soo much space that had been wasted up since the templateis just been compressed and focus out on center.Im not saying that we would be needing those fancy ones but if you do make out some comparison then you could really saythat this one is really just too far off when it comes to UI/UX.Even though some people would be saying that it might not really be that important but it is also one of the main factors on why people would be choosing up a certain platform.

comments.author: ryzaadit
comments.body: Quote from: stomachgrowls on October 06, 2022, 07:46:30 PM-snip-Do everyone really care even there has some space ?I just check & login is not really have a big space at all & everyone love a simple design. IMO the design is already enough, what we really care about most of casino is fast withdraw + without any problem in some case.So, I don't think people are gonna commend for the design and template. All responsive without any problem.

comments.author: TimeTeller
comments.body: Quote from: Fivestar4everMVP on October 06, 2022, 06:36:40 PMFirst, I want to say.. Welcome to the forum, its nice having you guys here.I checked the casino out and I must say you have a very nice UX design and a user friendly interface, signing up is also very good and speedy, took me less than a minute to sign up, and I notice you guys do not require users to verify the email address they are signing up with - wouldn't this cause problems in tht future?And I wish to comment on this part I screenshot and uploaded below, do you guys offer the ability to switch or swap between crypto  coins inside the casino? If yes, then I think this is unique (as I've not come across any casino with such a feature) and will make your casino stand out.-I am not very sure about the switching of coins inside the casino, because it doesn't have exchange tab.But they do have buy tab, where you can use Onramper and Changelly third party services.Also, do note that whatever coin you will deposit is the same coin you can withdraw as per their Terms - Section 12.So it doesn't mean that if you deposit BTC, you can withdraw TRX or LTC. You can withdraw BTC also, same deposit coin.

comments.author: Metaspins.com
comments.created_time: October 07, 2022, 08:14:00 AMLast edit: October 16, 2022, 04:40:58 AM by Mr. Big
comments.body: Quote from: Fivestar4everMVP on October 06, 2022, 06:36:40 PMFirst, I want to say.. Welcome to the forum, its nice having you guys here.I checked the casino out and I must say you have a very nice UX design and a user friendly interface, signing up is also very good and speedy, took me less than a minute to sign up, and I notice you guys do not require users to verify the email address they are signing up with - wouldn't this cause problems in tht future?And I wish to comment on this part I screenshot and uploaded below, do you guys offer the ability to switch or swap between crypto  coins inside the casino? If yes, then I think this is unique (as I've not come across any casino with such a feature) and will make your casino stand out.Thanks a lot for your feedback and we are happy to see at Metaspins  Currently, we send a confirmation email once you sign up so that you have the chance to verify your email, and in your account section you can set your preferences for email communications from us. Soon we will also launch options to sign up with social logins like Google, Facebook and more! All part of our choc-a-bloc roadmap for awesome integrations, features, promos and games that will all be first announced here and in our other community channels like Discord and Telegram  Since we're not a crypto exchange, unfortunately we can't swap cryptos on site, but you can soon Sell crypto into fiat. So if you come in with fiat funds, you can buy crypto on Metaspins via our PSPs in the Buy Crypto section of the cashier, then once you win and want to withdraw you can either withdraw your crypto winnings or sell them into fiat and onto the card of your choice!Quote from: stomachgrowls on October 06, 2022, 07:46:30 PMQuote from: Fivestar4everMVP on October 06, 2022, 06:36:40 PMFirst, I want to say.. Welcome to the forum, its nice having you guys here.I checked the casino out and I must say you have a very nice UX design and a user friendly interface, signing up is also very good and speedy, took me less than a minute to sign up, and I notice you guys do not require users to verify the email address they are signing up with - wouldn't this cause problems in tht future?And I wish to comment on this part I screenshot and uploaded below, do you guys offer the ability to switch or swap between crypto  coins inside the casino? If yes, then I think this is unique (as I've not come across any casino with such a feature) and will make your casino stand out.Well, for you it do looks nice but not for most people.Even though simplicity is beauty but this one is just too simple or being that generic.There's soo much space that had been wasted up since the templateis just been compressed and focus out on center.Im not saying that we would be needing those fancy ones but if you do make out some comparison then you could really saythat this one is really just too far off when it comes to UI/UX.Even though some people would be saying that it might not really be that important but it is also one of the main factors on why people would be choosing up a certain platform.Thanks for your feedback, we hope to build the best customer experience for everyone.   What would you like to see on Metaspins.com? [moderator's note: consecutive posts merged]Quote from: TimeTeller on October 06, 2022, 08:30:06 PMQuote from: Fivestar4everMVP on October 06, 2022, 06:36:40 PMFirst, I want to say.. Welcome to the forum, its nice having you guys here.I checked the casino out and I must say you have a very nice UX design and a user friendly interface, signing up is also very good and speedy, took me less than a minute to sign up, and I notice you guys do not require users to verify the email address they are signing up with - wouldn't this cause problems in tht future?And I wish to comment on this part I screenshot and uploaded below, do you guys offer the ability to switch or swap between crypto  coins inside the casino? If yes, then I think this is unique (as I've not come across any casino with such a feature) and will make your casino stand out.-I am not very sure about the switching of coins inside the casino, because it doesn't have exchange tab.But they do have buy tab, where you can use Onramper and Changelly third party services.Also, do note that whatever coin you will deposit is the same coin you can withdraw as per their Terms - Section 12.So it doesn't mean that if you deposit BTC, you can withdraw TRX or LTC. You can withdraw BTC also, same deposit coin.Yes, you are absolutely right. You can buy crypto using your card via our PSPs in the Buy Crypto section of the cashier. Also, you can deposit and withdraw the exact currencies, so when you deposit BTC -  you can withdraw BTC

comments.author: Docnaster
comments.body: Quote from: Metaspins.com on October 07, 2022, 08:14:00 AMSince we're not a crypto exchange, unfortunately we can't swap cryptos on site, but you can soon Sell crypto into fiat. So if you come in with fiat funds, you can buy crypto on Metaspins via our PSPs in the Buy Crypto section of the cashier, then once you win and want to withdraw you can either withdraw your crypto winnings or sell them into fiat and onto the card of your choice!This is already great, it will keep gamblers safe from volatility when the market is not steady. It is a good implementation and now I would like to sign up in your site. Are there limitations like max-withdrawal, kyc on a particular among of win and penalty on VPN use.

comments.author: Solosanz
comments.body: @OP you shouldn't create each post if you want to reply each user, you can "insert quote" of those users and reply it on single post only because this forum has a rule to not "post in a row". Sooner of later your previous post will got merged since you're breaking this rule.I didn't find any explanation about the level up, what's the requirement of minimum wagering to level up? does higher level will need higher wagering requirement? or it's just same like level 1, level 10 etc. Also does the XP we gained are same to any providers?

I think this site should pay attention to this part, because it is very annoying for users, especially those who have problems with scrolling.
